title: Diseases Of The Hearts And Their Cures (English)
author: Imam Ibn al-Qayyim
description: A profound spiritual guide discussing the ailments of the heart and their Islamic remedies.

title: Fortress of the Muslim (Arabic with English Translation)
author: Sa'id bin Ali bin Wahf Al-Qahtani
description: A popular collection of authentic supplications and invocations from the Quran and Sunnah for daily life.

title: Ibn Kathir THE SIGNS BEFORE THE DAY OF JUDGEMENT (English)
author: Imam Ibn Kathir
description: Exploration of the signs of the Day of Judgment according to Islamic tradition.

title: Ikhtisar Ulum al-Hadith By Ibn Kathir (Arabic with English Translation)
author: Imam Ibn Kathir
description: A concise work on the sciences of Hadith, essential for understanding prophetic traditions.

title: Khalid Bin Walid (Roman Urdu/Hindi)
author: Unknown
description: The first part of a biographical study of Khalid ibn al-Walid in Urdu-Hindi.

title: Learners Handbook of Tajweed Second Edition (English)
author: Unknown
description: A practical guide for learning the rules of Tajweed (Quranic recitation).

title: Supporting The Distressed Against The Tricks Of Satan (English)
author: Imam Ibn al-Qayyim
description: A work by Ibn al-Qayyim on how to protect oneself from the whispers and tricks of Satan.

title: Sword Of Allah Khalid Bin Al Waleed - A Biographical Study (English)
author: A.I. Akram
description: A comprehensive biography of Khalid ibn al-Walid, one of the greatest military generals in history.

title: The Prophet's Prayer - Sh. Muqbil Ibn Haadee Al-Waadiee (English)
author: Shaykh Muqbil ibn Hādī al-Wādiʿī
description: A detailed explanation of the Prophet Muhammad's prayer as described in authentic traditions.

title: Umar the Great (English)
author: Maulana Shibli Naumani
description: A comprehensive biography of Umar ibn al-Khattab, the second Caliph of Islam, detailing his life, reign, and contributions to Islamic history.

title: Rasool Ullah ﷺ Ke Sawalat Aur Sahaba Ke Jawabat (Urdu)
author: Unknown (Collected from classical Islamic sources)
description: A collection of questions posed by the Prophet Muhammad ﷺ to his companions, along with their insightful and spiritually uplifting answers. This book presents a beautiful interaction between the Prophet ﷺ and the Sahaba (رضي الله عنهم) in Urdu.

title: Fazail-e-Amaal (Urdu)
author: Maulana Muhammad Zakariyya Kandhlawi
description: A classic Urdu book full of virtues of Salah, Quran, Dhikr, and Tabligh, widely read for increasing Imaan and practicing good deeds.

title: Purification of the Heart (English)
author: Shaykh Hamza Yusuf (based on Ibn Ashir)
description: An English commentary on spiritual diseases of the heart and their cures, based on classical Islamic texts. Ideal for self-reform and tazkiyah.

title: 40 Hadith of Imam Nawawi (Arabic with English Translation)
author: Imam Nawawi
description: A concise and powerful collection of 40 hadith that lay the foundation of Islamic belief and ethics, with translations.

title: Umar ibn al-Khattab – His Life and Time (English)
author: Dr. 'Ali Muhammad as-Sallabi
description: A detailed and well-researched biography of the second Caliph of Islam, ‘Umar ibn al-Khattab (رضي الله عنه), written by renowned scholar Dr. 'Ali Muhammad as-Sallabi. The book explores his early life, conversion to Islam, leadership, conquests, and legacy in shaping the Islamic state.

title: Umar the Great (Urdu)
author: Allama Shibli Nomani
description: An influential Urdu biography of Caliph Umar ibn al-Khattab (RA), presenting his leadership, reforms, and contributions to Islamic governance. A timeless classic by Allama Shibli Nomani.

title: Sirat-un-Nabi ﷺ – Volume 1 (Urdu)
author: Allama Shibli Nomani & Syed Sulaiman Nadvi
description: Volume 1 of the detailed Urdu biography of Prophet Muhammad ﷺ covering his lineage, early life, and the beginning of the Prophetic mission.

title: Sirat-un-Nabi ﷺ – Volume 2 (Urdu)
author: Allama Shibli Nomani & Syed Sulaiman Nadvi
description: Volume 2 explores the early Meccan period, challenges faced by the Prophet ﷺ and his companions, and the Quraysh opposition.

title: Sirat-un-Nabi ﷺ – Volume 3 (Urdu)
author: Allama Shibli Nomani & Syed Sulaiman Nadvi
description: Volume 3 focuses on the migration to Madinah, the formation of the first Islamic state, and social reforms introduced by the Prophet ﷺ.

title: Sirat-un-Nabi ﷺ – Volume 4 (Urdu)
author: Allama Shibli Nomani & Syed Sulaiman Nadvi
description: Volume 4 covers the significant battles including Badr, Uhud, and Khandaq, and the strategies of peace and defense by the Prophet ﷺ.

title: Sirat-un-Nabi ﷺ – Volume 5 (Urdu)
author: Allama Shibli Nomani & Syed Sulaiman Nadvi
description: Volume 5 discusses the Treaty of Hudaybiyyah, conquest of Makkah, and various expeditions that shaped the spread of Islam.

title: Sirat-un-Nabi ﷺ – Volume 6 (Urdu)
author: Allama Shibli Nomani & Syed Sulaiman Nadvi
description: Volume 6 highlights the Farewell Pilgrimage, last sermons of the Prophet ﷺ, and his blessed departure from this world.

title: Sirat-un-Nabi ﷺ – Volume 7 (Urdu)
author: Allama Shibli Nomani & Syed Sulaiman Nadvi
description: Volume 7 offers an analytical conclusion, discussing the character, legacy, and everlasting impact of the Prophet Muhammad ﷺ on humanity.

title: Hayatus Sahabah (Lives of the Companions) (Urdu)
author: Maulana Muhammad Yusuf Kandhlawi
description: A legendary 3-volume Urdu collection of inspiring stories from the lives of the Sahaba (رضي الله عنهم), detailing their sacrifices and devotion to Islam.

title: Ar-Raheeq Al-Makhtum (The Sealed Nectar) (Urdu)
author: Safi-ur-Rahman Mubarakpuri
description: Prophet Muhammad ﷺ ki hayat-e-tayyibah par ek mukammal aur dilli asar daalnewali Urdu seerat ki kitaab, jo Rabita al-Alam al-Islami ke muqablay mein pehla inaam jeet chuki hai.

title: Ar-Raheeq Al-Makhtum (The Sealed Nectar) (English)
author: Safi-ur-Rahman Mubarakpuri
description: An award-winning English biography of Prophet Muhammad ﷺ, offering a rich and authentic account of his blessed life, struggles, and mission.
